description: When the user feels love — for Allah, the Prophet ﷺ, family, or creation — and seeks spiritual depth and balance in that love.

primary.text_en: But there are some who take others as Allah’s equal—they love them as they should love Allah. But the believers love Allah even more...
primary.text_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَندَادٗا يُحِبُّونَهُمْ كَحُبِّ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَشَدُّ حُبّٗا لِّلَّهِ...
primary.explanation: The love of believers for Allah surpasses all else.

primary.text_en: Say, [O Muhammad], 'If you should love Allah, then follow me, so Allah will love you and forgive you your sins.'
primary.text_ar: قُلْ إِن كُنتُمْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱللَّهَ فَٱتَّبِعُونِي يُحْبِبْكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ
primary.explanation: True love of Allah is shown through following His Messenger ﷺ.

primary.text_en: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds — the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
primary.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدّٗا
primary.explanation: Allah plants love for righteous believers in hearts.

primary.text_en: None of you truly believes until I am more beloved to him than his father, his child, and all of mankind.
primary.explanation: Loving the Prophet ﷺ is part of true faith.

primary.text_en: When Allah loves a servant, He calls Jibreel: 'Allah loves so-and-so, so love him.' Then Jibreel loves him and announces to the people of heaven that Allah loves so-and-so...
primary.explanation: When Allah loves you, the heavens rejoice in your name.

primary.text_en: A man will be with those whom he loves.
primary.explanation: Love connects us even in the Hereafter.

primary.text_en: You will not enter Paradise until you believe, and you will not believe until you love one another...
primary.explanation: Love is the key to unity and Paradise.

duas.text_en: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and the love of every action that brings me closer to Your love.
duas.text_ar: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ، وَحُبَّ مَنْ يُحِبُّكَ، وَحُبَّ عَمَلٍ يُقَرِّبُنِي إِلَى حُبِّكَ
duas.explanation: A beautiful supplication for spiritual love.

duas.text_en: O Allah, place light in my heart, light in my sight, and light in my hearing.
duas.text_ar: ٱللَّهُمَّ ٱجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي نُورٗا وَفِي بَصَرِي نُورٗا وَفِي سَمْعِي نُورٗا...
duas.explanation: True love brings light into one’s being.

reflection: Love in Islam is divine — rooted in sincerity, sacrifice, and nearness to Allah. Whether love for Allah, His Prophet ﷺ, or others for His sake, it softens the heart and connects souls. Let love lead you closer to mercy, compassion, and eternal companionship in Jannah.
